title: Open Source Keeps FLASH GAMES Alive In 2024
description:
I grew up with flash games so I was quite sad to hear that Flash was going away back in 2020 but it's not as bad as it initially seemed because there's a couple of projects that aim to reimplement Adobe's Flash Player
